text:

but it's gonna be in person

and we're gonna do
a show in four days.
We must do our exercises.

through the curtain

and you're gonna
grab this microphone.

coming to my bar mitzvah.

A man goes to the doctor
and the doctor says,

"You know, you have
to stop masturbating."
He goes, "Why?"

He says, "Because I'm
trying to examine you."
Thank you all for being here.

comedy show before?
Oh my god!
My wife left me recently.
He's so naughty.
Life is a performance.
Then there was my head surgery.

this, I'm dead.

Laughter is like food
you put in your body.

not in an artificial way.
You know? Genuinely funny.

are genuinely funny.
You do?
Yeah.
Really?
Yes.

You're the first person
who's ever told me that.
